trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> that processes security tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> que processa tokens de segurança do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> class that uses the default cookie transforms and token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> classe que usa as transformações de cookie padrão e a vida útil do token.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> properties are initialized to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultCookieTransforms>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>e as <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>propriedades são inicializadas e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultCookieTransforms>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultCookieTransforms> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> class that uses the specified cookie transforms.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> transforma de classe que usa o cookie especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>propriedade é inicializada para <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The transforms to apply when encoding or decoding the cookie.
trans-unit.target: As transformações para aplicar ao codificação ou decodificação de cookie.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>

trans-unit.source: transforms is .
trans-unit.target: transformsis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> class that uses the specified cookie transforms and token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> classe que usa as transformações de cookie especificado e a vida útil do token.

trans-unit.source: The transforms to apply when encoding or decoding the cookie.
trans-unit.target: As transformações para aplicar ao codificação ou decodificação de cookie.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>

trans-unit.source: The default lifetime for a token.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de vida padrão para um token.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime*>

trans-unit.source: transforms is .
trans-unit.target: transformsis .

trans-unit.source: tokenLifetime is less than or equal to <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: tokenLifetimeé menor ou igual a <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the transforms specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*> property to either encode or decode the specified cookie.
trans-unit.target: Aplica as transformações especificadas pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>propriedade para codificar ou decodificar o cookie especificado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>

trans-unit.source: When encoding a cookie transforms are applied in the order in which they appear in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando um cookie de codificação transformações são aplicadas na ordem em que aparecem no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>

trans-unit.source: When decoding a cookie, they are applied in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: Ao decodificar um cookie, elas são aplicadas na ordem inversa.

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> and [qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) methods to encode and decode the cookie material.
trans-unit.target: Chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>e [qualifyHint = False & no upgrade automático = True](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) métodos para codificar e decodificar o material de cookie.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cookie that will be transformed.
trans-unit.target: O cookie que será transformado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be encoded; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be decoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cookie deve ser codificado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o cookie deve ser decodificado.

trans-unit.source: The encoded or decoded cookie.
trans-unit.target: O cookie codificado ou decodificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the reader is positioned at a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" name="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o leitor está posicionado em uma <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" name="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> over the incoming <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>pela entrada <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The reader should be positioned at a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" name="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O leitor deve ser posicionado em uma <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" name="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader points to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" name="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" href=""></xref> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o leitor aponta para um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" name="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" href=""> </xref> elemento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this handler supports validation of tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este manipulador oferece suporte à validação dos tokens do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handler supports validation of tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o manipulador oferece suporte à validação dos tokens do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this handler can write tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este manipulador pode gravar tokens do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handler can write tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o manipulador pode gravar tokens do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome para o elemento cookie.

trans-unit.source: This property is used in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> methods to determine the element under which the encoded token material should be written or read.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A>métodos para determinar o elemento sob a qual o material de token codificado deve ser gravado ou lidos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: O nome para o elemento cookie.

trans-unit.source: The default element name is “Cookie”.
trans-unit.target: O nome do elemento padrão é "Cookie".

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o namespace para o elemento cookie.

trans-unit.source: This property is used in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> methods to determine the namespace of the element under which the encoded token material should be written or read.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A>métodos para determinar o namespace do elemento sob a qual o material de token codificado deve ser gravado ou lidos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: O namespace para o elemento cookie.

trans-unit.source: The default namespace is “http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/security”.
trans-unit.target: O namespace padrão é "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/security".

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> based on the specified claims principal and time range during which the token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> com base em declarações especificadas principal e tempo intervalo durante o qual o token é válido.

trans-unit.source: The claims principal.
trans-unit.target: A entidade de declarações.

trans-unit.source: A caller-defined context string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de contexto definido pelo chamador.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the endpoint to which the token is scoped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do ponto de extremidade ao qual o token está no escopo.

trans-unit.source: The time instant at which the token becomes valid.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de instantâneo no qual o token é validado.

trans-unit.source: The time instant after which the token is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: O instantâneo de tempo após o qual o token não é mais válido.

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança de sessão que foi criado.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the new session token are set according to the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades no token de nova sessão estão definidas de acordo com os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: principal is .
trans-unit.target: principalis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a security token based on the specified token descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Cria um token de segurança com base no descritor de token especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a session security token by using the following properties in the token descriptor: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um token de segurança de sessão usando as seguintes propriedades no descritor de token: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.SaveBootstrapContext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set `true` on the token handler configuration specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property, the bootstrap context is created from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and is saved in the session token.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.SaveBootstrapContext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>está definida `true` na configuração do manipulador de token especificada pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>propriedade, o contexto de inicialização é criado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade e é salvo no token de sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.SaveBootstrapContext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The token descriptor from which to create the token.
trans-unit.target: O descritor de token do qual criar o token.

trans-unit.source: The security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança que foi criado.

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso será uma instância de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: tokenDescriptor is .
trans-unit.target: tokenDescriptoris .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>

trans-unit.source: A read only collection that contains the list of default transforms to be applied to cookies, the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.DeflateCookieTransform"></xref> and the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A leitura apenas a coleção que contém a lista de transformações padrão a ser aplicado a cookies, o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.DeflateCookieTransform"> </xref> e <xref href="System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: A constant that specifies the default lifetime for cookies, ten hours.
trans-unit.target: Uma constante que especifica o tempo de vida padrão de cookies, dez horas.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tempo de vida de token padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: O padrão vida útil do token.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the token type URIs for the token types that can be processed by this handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de token URIs para os tipos de token que podem ser processados por esse manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The following type URIs are supported: "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/servicemodel/tokens/SecureConversation", "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512/sct", and "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc/sct".
trans-unit.target: O seguinte tipo de URIs são suportados: "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/servicemodel/tokens/SecureConversation", "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512/sct" e "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc/sct".

trans-unit.source: The token type identifier URIs for token types that can be processed by this handler.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de tipo de token URIs para os tipos de token que podem ser processados por esse manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Loads custom configuration from XML.
trans-unit.target: Configuração personalizada de cargas de XML.

trans-unit.source: Called by the configuration infrastructure to initialize the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> instance.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pela infraestrutura de configuração para inicializar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>instância.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> property from the `lifetime` attribute of the [\<sessionTokenRequirement\>](../Topic/%3CsessionTokenRequirement%3E.md) element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>propriedade o `lifetime` atributo do [ \< sessionTokenRequirement\>](../Topic/%3CsessionTokenRequirement%3E.md) elemento no arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The custom configuration elements.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos de configuração personalizada.

trans-unit.source: customConfigElements is .
trans-unit.target: customConfigElementsis .

trans-unit.source: The configuration specified by customConfigElements is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A configuração especificada pelo customConfigElements não é válido.

trans-unit.source: For example, it does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<sessionTokenRequirement>" name="<sessionTokenRequirement>" href=""></xref> element, it contains more than one <xref uid="langword_csharp_<sessionTokenRequirement>" name="<sessionTokenRequirement>" href=""></xref> element, a valid <xref:System.TimeSpan> value cannot be read from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_lifetime" name="lifetime" href=""></xref> attribute, or the <xref uid="langword_csharp_lifetime" name="lifetime" href=""></xref> attribute specifies a value that is less than <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, ele não contém um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<sessionTokenRequirement>" name="<sessionTokenRequirement>" href=""> </xref> elemento, ele contém mais de uma <xref uid="langword_csharp_<sessionTokenRequirement>" name="<sessionTokenRequirement>" href=""> </xref> elemento, válido <xref:System.TimeSpan>não é possível ler o valor da <xref uid="langword_csharp_lifetime" name="lifetime" href=""> </xref> atributo, ou o <xref uid="langword_csharp_lifetime" name="lifetime" href=""> </xref> atributo especifica um valor que é menor que <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> usando o leitor XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The reader must be positioned at either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or a WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element.
trans-unit.target: O leitor deve ser posicionado em um Feb2005 de conversa WS-Secure ou um 1.3 de conversa WS-Secure `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=fullName> method using a default token resolver.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão chama o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=fullName>método usando um resolvedor de token padrão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> over the incoming <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>pela entrada <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was read, an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança de sessão que foi lido, uma instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: The reader is not positioned at a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> or the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: O leitor não está posicionado em uma <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> não pode ser lido.

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from a stream of bytes by using the specified token resolver.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> de um fluxo de bytes usando o resolvedor de token especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> over the token and invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão cria um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>sobre o token e invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: The stream of bytes that contains the token.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de bytes que contém o token.

trans-unit.source: The token resolver to use.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor de token para usar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> that was read.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> que foi lido.

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> using the specified XML reader and token resolver.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> usando o resolvedor de leitor e o token XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The reader must be positioned at either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or a WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element.
trans-unit.target: O leitor deve ser posicionado em um Feb2005 de conversa WS-Secure ou um 1.3 de conversa WS-Secure `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: If the token material is cached, it is read from the token cache, which is an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache> class.
trans-unit.target: Se o material de token é armazenado em cache, ele será lida do cache de token, que é uma ocorrência da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the token material is read from the child element of the `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element that is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A> properties and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method is invoked to decode the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o material de token é lido do elemento filho do `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` que é especificado pelo elemento o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A>Propriedades e o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>método é invocado para decodificar o cookie.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how session tokens are serialized into a `<SecurityContextToken` element, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como os tokens de sessão são serializados em um `<SecurityContextToken` elemento, consulte o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> over the incoming <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>pela entrada <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that can used to resolve the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que podem ser usadas para resolver o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was read, an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança de sessão que foi lido, uma instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- tokenResolver is .
trans-unit.target: -or- tokenResolver is .

trans-unit.source: The reader is not positioned at a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> or the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: O leitor não está posicionado em uma <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> não pode ser lido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the transforms that will be applied to cookies.
trans-unit.target: Define as transformações que serão aplicadas a cookies.

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of transforms returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Define a lista de transformações retornado pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>

trans-unit.source: Transforms will be applied in the order in which they appear in the list when encoding a cookie and in the reverse order when decoding a cookie.
trans-unit.target: As transformações serão aplicadas na ordem em que aparecem na lista ao codificar um cookie e na ordem inversa ao decodificar um cookie.

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > If the `transforms` parameter is `null`, an exception will be thrown from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method when it is called to encode or decode the cookie.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > Se o `transforms` parâmetro é `null`, uma exceção será lançada do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>método quando ele é chamado para codificar ou decodificar o cookie.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>

trans-unit.source: The transforms to use.
trans-unit.target: As transformações que serão usadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a vida útil do token.

trans-unit.source: By default, if the [\<sessionTokenRequirement\>](../Topic/%3CsessionTokenRequirement%3E.md) element is specified in the configuration file, the TokenLifetime property is initialized to the value of the `lifetime` attribute by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, se o [ \< sessionTokenRequirement\>](../Topic/%3CsessionTokenRequirement%3E.md) elemento for especificado no arquivo de configuração, a propriedade TokenLifetime é inicializada com o valor da `lifetime` atributo pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: A vida útil do token.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a time span that is less than or equal to zero occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre uma tentativa de definir um período de tempo é menor que ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the tokens that this handler processes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo dos tokens que este manipulador processa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the transforms that will be applied to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as transformações que serão aplicadas ao cookie.

trans-unit.source: The transforms are applied in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: As transformações são aplicadas no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list of transforms that will be applied to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: A lista de transformações que serão aplicadas ao cookie.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the session associated with the specified token is still valid.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a sessão associada ao token especificado ainda é válida.

trans-unit.source: Validity is determined by checking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom*> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo*> properties of the specified token.
trans-unit.target: Validade é determinada verificando o <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades do token especificado.

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the session is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção é gerada se a sessão não é mais válida.

trans-unit.source: The token is not valid if its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to a value that occurs later than <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>, or if its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> property is set to a value that occurs earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O token não é válido se seu <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>propriedade é definida como um valor que acontece depois que <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>, ou se sua <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>propriedade é definida como um valor que ocorre anteriores <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>.</xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> methods to validate the session.
trans-unit.target: Chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>métodos para validar a sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token to be checked.
trans-unit.target: O token a ser verificada.

trans-unit.source: securityToken is .
trans-unit.target: securityTokenis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom*> property of the token is later than <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow*>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade do token é posterior <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo*> property of the token is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow*>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade do token é anterior à <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified token and returns its claims.
trans-unit.target: Valida o token especificado e retorna suas declarações.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateSession%2A> method to validate the token.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateSession%2A>método para validar o token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateSession%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O token a ser validado.

trans-unit.source: Must be assignable from <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser atribuível do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: As identidades contidas no token.

trans-unit.source: token is not assignable from .
trans-unit.target: tokennão é atribuível da .

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified session token and returns its claims.
trans-unit.target: Valida o token de sessão especificada e retorna suas declarações.

trans-unit.source: Performs a check to make sure that the specified token is scoped for the specified endpoint ID and, if so, invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> method; otherwise, throws a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma verificação para certificar-se de que o token especificado tem seu escopo definido para a ID do ponto de extremidade especificado e, nesse caso, invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>método; caso contrário, lança <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Session tokens that have an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A> property that is `null` or empty are considered to be globally scoped.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Tokens de sessão que têm um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>propriedade `null` ou vazios são considerados para ser seu escopo definido globalmente.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>

trans-unit.source: This presents a potential security risk.
trans-unit.target: Isso apresenta um risco à segurança.

trans-unit.source: For this reason you should make sure that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A> property is set in your session tokens.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo você deve garantir que o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>estiver definida em seus tokens de sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O token a ser validado.

trans-unit.source: Must be assignable from <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser atribuível do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the endpoint to which the token is scoped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do ponto de extremidade ao qual o token está no escopo.

trans-unit.source: The identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: As identidades contidas no token.

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: -or- endpointId is .
trans-unit.target: -or- endpointId is .

trans-unit.source: token is not assignable from .
trans-unit.target: tokennão é atribuível da .

trans-unit.source: The property of the specified token is not or empty and its value is different than that specified by the endpointId parameter.
trans-unit.target: O propriedade do token especificado não é ou vazio e seu valor é diferente daquele especificado pelo endpointId parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified token into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Serializa o token especificado em uma matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified token by creating and XML writer over a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Serializa o token especificado com a criação e o gravador de XML em um <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>e chamar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>

trans-unit.source: See that overload for more details.
trans-unit.target: Consulte essa sobrecarga para obter mais detalhes.

trans-unit.source: The token to write.
trans-unit.target: O token a ser gravado.

trans-unit.source: An encoded byte array.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de bytes codificados.

trans-unit.source: sessiontoken is .
trans-unit.target: sessiontokenis .

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified token by using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: Serializa o token especificado usando o gravador XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation serializes the specified token as either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element, depending on the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão serializa o token especificado como WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 ou WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` elemento, dependendo do valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is serialized as the `Id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é serializada como o `Id` atributo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is serialized as the `<Identifier>` child element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é serializada como o `<Identifier>` elemento filho.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If not `null` the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is serialized as an `<Instance>` element.
trans-unit.target: Se não `null` o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é serializada como um `<Instance>` elemento.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the entire token is serialized into binary array which is passed to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `false`, o token inteiro é serializado em uma matriz binária que é passada para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>método a ser decodificado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The encoded token is then written as a base64 encoded value to the element and namespace specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O token codificado é gravado como um valor codificado na base64 para o elemento e o namespace especificado pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, the token is not serialized.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `true`, o token não é serializado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The XML writer with which to serialize the token.
trans-unit.target: O gravador de XML com o qual serializar o token.

trans-unit.source: The token to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O token a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- token is .
trans-unit.target: -or- token is .

trans-unit.source: token is not assignable from .
trans-unit.target: tokennão é atribuível da .

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion*> of the token specifies a version of WS-Secure Conversation that is not supported by the handler.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion*> do token Especifica uma versão do WS-Secure Conversation não é suportada pelo manipulador.
